00017 User::User()
00018 {
00019         // load query history
00020         ifstream ifs;
00021         ifs.open("queryHistory.log");
00022         if(!ifs.good())
00023                 cerr<<"Warning: can't load query history log"<<endl;
00024         else
00025         {
00026                 string line, keyword, person;
00027                 getline(ifs,line);
00028                 while(!ifs.eof())
00029                 {
00030                         int i;
00031                         while( (i=line.find('\r')) >= 0 ) line.erase( i, i+1 );
00032                         queryHistory.push_back(new BasicQuery(0));
00033                         queryHistory.back()->SetKeyword(line);
00034                         getline(ifs,line);
00035                 }
00036         }
00037         ifs.close();
00038 }

00040 User::~User()
00041 {
00042         // save query history
00043         ofstream ofs;
00044         ofs.open("queryHistory.log");
00045         if(!ofs.good())
00046                 cerr<<"Warning: can't save query history log"<<endl;
00047         else
00048         {
00049                 int historySize = 0;
00050                 for (int i=queryHistory.size()-1; i>=0 && historySize<MAXHISTORYLOGSIZE; i--)
00051                 {
00052                         ofs<<queryHistory[i]->GetKeyword()<<endl;
00053                         historySize++;
00054                 }
00055         }
00056         ofs.close();
00057 
00058         // clear memory
00059         for (int i=0; i<relevantPosts.size(); i++)
00060                 delete relevantPosts[i];
00061         for (int i=0; i<queryHistory.size(); i++)
00062                 delete queryHistory[i];
00063 }

00070 void User::InitUser()
00071 {
00072         cout<<"Enter user name: "<<endl<<"> ";
00073         cin>>id;
00074         cout<<"Enter password: "<<endl<<"> ";
00075         cout.flush();
00076 
00077         pwd = "";
00078         const char BACKSPACE=127;
00079         const char RETURN=10;
00080         char c;
00081         raw();
00082         while ((c=getch()) != RETURN)
00083         {
00084                 if(c==BACKSPACE)
00085                 {
00086                         if(pwd.length()!=0)
00087                         {
00088                                 cout <<"\b \b";
00089                                 cout.flush();
00090                                 pwd.resize(pwd.length()-1);
00091                         }
00092                 }
00093                 else
00094                 {
00095                         pwd+=c;
00096                         cout<<"*";
00097                         cout.flush();
00098                 }
00099         }
00100         cout<<endl;
00101         cooked();
00102 }

00104 int User::Login(SocialNet* n)
00105 {
00106         int returnedValue =  n->Login(id, pwd);
00107 
00108         // load friend list from file saved by SocialNet
00109         friends.clear();
00110         ifstream ifs;
00111         ifs.open("FriendsList");
00112         if(!ifs.good())
00113                 cerr<<"Warning: can't load file FriendsList"<<endl;
00114         else
00115         {
00116                 int i;
00117                 string line;
00118                 getline(ifs,line);
00119                 while(!ifs.eof())
00120                 {
00121                         while( (i=line.find('\r')) >= 0 ) line.erase( i, i+1 );
00122                         friends.push_back(line);
00123                         getline(ifs,line);
00124                 }
00125         }
00126         ifs.close();
00127 
00128         return returnedValue;
00129 }

00131 bool User::WantContinue()
00132 {
00133         string want = "";
00134         while (want != "y" && want != "n")
00135         {
00136                 cout<<"Start the next query? [y/n]: "<<endl<<"> ";
00137                 cin>>want;
00138         }
00139 
00140         if (want == "y")
00141                 return true;
00142         else
00143                 return false;
00144 }

00146 void User::Search(Query* q)
00147 {
00148         q->InitQuery(this);
00149         queryHistory.push_back(q);
00150         for (int i=0; i<relevantPosts.size(); i++)
00151                 delete relevantPosts[i];
00152         relevantPosts.clear();
00153         relevantPosts = queryHistory.back()->Execute();
00154 }

00156 void User::InteractWithPosts()
00157 {
00158         if (relevantPosts.empty())
00159                 cout<<"No relevant posts found."<<endl;
00160         else
00161         {
00162                 Post* currentPost = *relevantPosts.begin();
00163                 Post* futurePost = currentPost;
00164                 string option;
00165                 while (currentPost != 0)
00166                 {
00167                         currentPost->PrintContent(cout);
00168                         currentPost->PrintOption(cout);
00169 
00170                         while(currentPost == futurePost)
00171                         {
00172                                 cin>>option;
00173                                 futurePost = currentPost->ExecuteOption(option, currentPost);
00174                         }
00175                         currentPost = futurePost;
00176                 }
00177         }
00178 }
